  • Constructor Details

    • PersonService

      @Autowired public PersonService(DataRepository dataRepository)

  • Method Details

    • createPerson

      public void createPerson(Person personToCreate)
      Creates a new person if they do not already exist in the data repository. Throws an exception if the person already exists.
      Parameters:
      personToCreate - The person object to be created and added to the data repository.
      Throws:
      AlreadyExistsException - if the person already exists in the repository.

    • updatePerson

      public void updatePerson(Person updatedPerson)
      Updates an existing person in the data repository. Throws an exception if the person is not found.
      Parameters:
      updatedPerson - The person object with updated information.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the person is not found in the repository.

    • deletePerson

      public void deletePerson(PersonFullNameDTO personDTO)
      Deletes a person from the data repository. If the person has an associated medical record, the medical record will also be deleted.
      Parameters:
      personDTO - The DTO object containing the full name of the person to be deleted.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the person is not found in the repository.

    • mapPersonToMedicalRecord

      public Map<Person,MedicalRecord> mapPersonToMedicalRecord(Set<Person> persons)
      Maps a set of persons to their corresponding medical records.
      Parameters:
      persons - A set of Person objects.
      Returns:
      A map where each person is associated with their corresponding medical record.

    • getMedicalRecord

      public Optional<MedicalRecord> getMedicalRecord(Person person)
      Retrieves the medical record for a given person.
      Parameters:
      person - The person whose medical record is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the medical record of the person, or an empty Optional if not found.

    • getAge

      public int getAge(LocalDate birthDate)
      Calculates the age of a person based on their birthdate.
      Parameters:
      birthDate - The birthdate of the person.
      Returns:
      The age of the person in years.

    • getAge

      public int getAge(Person person)
      Retrieves the age of a person using their medical record.
      Parameters:
      person - The person whose age is to be calculated.
      Returns:
      The age of the person in years, or -1 if the person's medical record is not found.

    • isAdult

      public boolean isAdult(Person person) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.exc.StreamReadException, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DatabindException, IOException
      Determines if a person is considered an adult (18 or older).
      Parameters:
      person - The person to check.
      Returns:
      true if the person is an adult, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error reading medical records.
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DatabindException - if there is an error binding the medical records.
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.exc.StreamReadException - if there is an error reading the medical records stream.

    • isChild

      public boolean isChild(Person person) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.exc.StreamReadException, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DatabindException, IOException
      Determines if a person is considered a child (younger than 18).
      Parameters:
      person - The person to check.
      Returns:
      true if the person is a child, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error reading medical records.
      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DatabindException - if there is an error binding the medical records.
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.exc.StreamReadException - if there is an error reading the medical records stream.

    • getPersonsByLastName

      public List<PersonByLastNameDTO> getPersonsByLastName(String lastName)
      Retrieves a list of persons with a matching last name, along with their medical records.
      Parameters:
      lastName - The last name to filter persons by.
      Returns:
      A list of PersonByLastNameDTO objects containing person details and medical information.

    • getEmailsByCity

      public Set<String> getEmailsByCity(String city)
      Retrieves a set of emails of persons who reside in a specific city.
      Parameters:
      city - The city to filter persons by.
      Returns:
      A set of emails of persons who live in the given city.
